Can I download a mobile app to try fractional reserve currencies on testnet?
No, there is no mobile app available. Instead, you can download the Verus Desktop application to try fractional reserve currencies on testnet.

Download the wallet now to try fractional reserve currencies on testnet. See the developments for yourself! If you need help or have questions, don’t hesitate to ask on Discord.
